sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import styles from './Modal.module.css'; // import Button from '../button/Button'; import cart from '../navbar/cart.png'; /** * Displays a modal for a product when the view Link on a product card is clicked * @param {Object} product - the product json object to display in the modal * @param {String} imageSrc - the route to retrieve the product image from */ const Modal = ({ product, imageSrc, wishListBtn }) => (
{product.name}
{product.demographic} {' '} {product.category}

{product.description}

{`$${product.price}`}
Product Type: {product.type}
Primary Color Swatch:
Secondary Color Swatch:
{wishListBtn}
); export default Modal;
